title: Flan de Saint Jean de Minervois
description: If you like crème caramel you’re going to love this – a version fit for an emperor. It’s made with a very special sweet wine from the South of France called Muscat de Saint-Jean-de-Minervois. If you don’t want to use wine, you can use an extra 100ml of milk.
ingredients: 100ml/3½fl oz sweet muscat wine (or any other dessert wine)
